-- This script was generated by a beta version of the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE public.cities
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    city_name character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.cvs
(
    cv_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    job_seeker_id integer NOT NULL,
    description text,
    github_adress text,
    linkedin_adress text,
    PRIMARY KEY (cv_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.education
(
    education_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    cv_id integer NOT NULL,
    starting_date date NOT NULL,
    ending_date date,
    school_id integer NOT NULL,
    "school_department_İd" integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (education_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.employers
(
    employer_id integer NOT NULL,
    company_name character varying(200) NOT NULL,
    website_adress character varying(200) NOT NULL,
    phone_number character varying(20) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (employer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.job_advertisement
(
    job_advertisement_id integer NOT NULL,
    application_deadline_date date NOT NULL,
    is_active boolean NOT NULL,
    job_description character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    max_salary integer,
    min_salary integer,
    position_amount integer NOT NULL,
    release_date date NOT NULL,
    city_id integer NOT NULL,
    employer_id integer NOT NULL,
    job_position_id integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (job_advertisement_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.job_seeker_language
(
    job_seeker_language_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    cv_id integer NOT NULL,
    language_id integer NOT NULL,
    language_level integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (job_seeker_language_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.job_seekers
(
    job_seeker_id integer NOT NULL,
    first_name character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    birth_date date NOT NULL,
    identity_number character varying(11) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (job_seeker_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.languages
(
    language_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    language_name character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (language_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.photos
(
    photo_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    cv_id integer NOT NULL,
    photo_url text,
    PRIMARY KEY (photo_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.positions
(
    position_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    position_name character varying(200) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (position_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.school
(
    school_id integer NOT NULL,
    school_name text NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (school_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.school_department
(
    school_department_id integer NOT NULL,
    school_department_name text NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (school_department_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.system_personnels
(
    system_personnel_id integer NOT NULL,
    first_name character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    id integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (system_personnel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.technologies
(
    technology_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    cv_id integer NOT NULL,
    technology_name text NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (technology_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.users
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    email character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    password character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    is_active boolean NOT NULL,
    created_date date NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.work_experiences
(
    work_experiences_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    cv_id integer NOT NULL,
    position_id integer NOT NULL,
    workplace_name text NOT NULL,
    starting_date date NOT NULL,
    ending_date date,
    PRIMARY KEY (work_experiences_id)
);

ALTER TABLE public.cvs
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (job_seeker_id)
    REFERENCES public.job_seekers (job_seeker_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.education
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (cv_id)
    REFERENCES public.cvs (cv_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.education
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (school_id)
    REFERENCES public.school (school_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.education
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("school_department_İd")
    REFERENCES public.school_department (school_department_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.employers
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (employer_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_advertisement
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (city_id)
    REFERENCES public.cities (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_advertisement
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (job_position_id)
    REFERENCES public.positions (position_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_advertisement
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (employer_id)
    REFERENCES public.employers (employer_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_seeker_language
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (cv_id)
    REFERENCES public.cvs (cv_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_seeker_language
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (language_id)
    REFERENCES public.languages (language_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_seekers
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (job_seeker_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.photos
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (cv_id)
    REFERENCES public.cvs (cv_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.system_personnels
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.system_personnels
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (system_personnel_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.technologies
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (cv_id)
    REFERENCES public.cvs (cv_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.work_experiences
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (cv_id)
    REFERENCES public.cvs (cv_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.work_experiences
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (position_id)
    REFERENCES public.positions (position_id)
    NOT VALID;

END;
